duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide direct ABA therapy to children diagnosed with autism, ADHD, behavior disorders, or other developmental disabilities in 1:1 or group settings.
Maintain client confidentiality in accordance with HIPAA.
Record accurate data via documenting either on data sheets or in provided data collection software as determined by Keeping it Specially Simple.
Work collaboratively with other members of the team including the client, caregivers, outside professionals, supervising BCBA, and other therapists.
Implement behavioral assessment/treatment programs with children with developmental disabilities.
